feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A software engineer and AI researcher focusing on natural language processing and machine learning. Created custom NLP solutions, such as an Afaan Oromo News Classification System and an Amharic Context-Aware Spell Checker

entry.title: Ecologists find computer vision models’ blind spots in retrieving wildlife images

link.title: Ecologists find computer vision models’ blind spots in retrieving wildlife images

entry.summary: Biodiversity researchers tested vision systems on how well they could retrieve relevant nature images. More advanced models performed well on simple queries but struggled with more research-specific prompts.

entry.title: Startup’s autonomous drones precisely track warehouse inventories

link.title: Startup’s autonomous drones precisely track warehouse inventories

entry.summary: Corvus Robotics, founded by Mohammed Kabir ’21, is using drones that can navigate in GPS-denied environments to expedite inventory management.

entry.title: MIT welcomes Frida Polli as its next visiting innovation scholar

link.title: MIT welcomes Frida Polli as its next visiting innovation scholar

entry.summary: The neuroscientist turned entrepreneur will be hosted by the MIT Schwarzman College of Computing and focus on advancing the intersection of behavioral science and AI across MIT.

entry.title: Need a research hypothesis? Ask AI.

link.title: Need a research hypothesis? Ask AI.

entry.summary: MIT engineers developed AI frameworks to identify evidence-driven hypotheses that could advance biologically inspired materials.

entry.title: MIT engineers grow “high-rise” 3D chips
entry.summary: An electronic stacking technique could exponentially increase the number of transistors on chips, enabling more efficient AI hardware.

entry.title: When MIT’s interdisciplinary NEET program is a perfect fit

link.title: When MIT’s interdisciplinary NEET program is a perfect fit

entry.summary: Junior Katie Spivakovsky describes her path through New Engineering Education Transformation to biomedical research and beyond.

entry.title: MIT researchers introduce Boltz-1, a fully open-source model for predicting biomolecular structures

link.title: MIT researchers introduce Boltz-1, a fully open-source model for predicting biomolecular structures

entry.summary: With models like AlphaFold3 limited to academic research, the team built an equivalent alternative, to encourage innovation more broadly.

entry.title: Study reveals AI chatbots can detect race, but racial bias reduces response empathy

link.title: Study reveals AI chatbots can detect race, but racial bias reduces response empathy

entry.summary: Researchers at MIT, NYU, and UCLA develop an approach to help evaluate whether large language models like GPT-4 are equitable enough to be clinically viable for mental health support.

entry.title: Lara Ozkan named 2025 Marshall Scholar
entry.summary: The MIT senior will pursue graduate studies in the UK at Cambridge University and Imperial College London.

entry.title: MIT affiliates named 2024 Schmidt Sciences AI2050 Fellows

link.title: MIT affiliates named 2024 Schmidt Sciences AI2050 Fellows

entry.summary: Five MIT faculty members and two additional alumni are honored with fellowships to advance research on beneficial AI.
